
public class App {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub

	int age = 16;
	int age2 = 24;
	double moneyInWallet = 315.70;
	double moneyInWallet2 = 37.96;
	int numberOfFriends = 7;
	int numberOfFriends2 = 4;
	double pokemonCard = 3.99;
	double concertTickets = 189.60;
	String firstName = "Leon";
	String firstName2 = "Atreus";
	char middleInitial = 'K';
	char middleInitial2 = 'R';
	String lastName = "Kennedy";
	String lastName2 = "Loki";
	
	System.out.println(moneyInWallet - concertTickets);
	System.out.println(moneyInWallet2 - pokemonCard);
	System.out.println(firstName + " " + middleInitial + " " + lastName);
	System.out.println(firstName2 + " " + middleInitial2 + " " + lastName2);
	System.out.println("Hello, my name is" + " " + firstName + " " + middleInitial + " " + lastName + ". " + "I am" + " " + age2);
	System.out.println("Hello, my name is" + " " + firstName2 + " " + middleInitial2 + " " + lastName2 + ". " + "I am" + " " + age);
	System.out.println(age/numberOfFriends2);
	System.out.println(age2/numberOfFriends);
	
	
	
	}}
